website_summaries.verdict: Don't let the low retail price fool you. This cookware set is a solid midrange performer. Great wedding or housewarming gift idea.
pros: Ideal medium weight pans and glass lids
cons: We do not recommend for use in ovens

customer_reviews.title: I love this set and I am very pleased and satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Amazon Delivery was quick and the delivery driver was kind and hand delivered my package directly to me, inside my property and a safe and secure location. He was friendly and even Thank me for my order. I admire that. Thank you. The pots are sturdy and dursble. A buetiful stainless bottom cooking surface and I love the grip handles on both the large and small duch ovens. I also like the thumb grip 5 piece utensils set that came included. I love the color black. Great PRODUCT, cooking was easy nothing stuck to the surface and easy to clean. Nice product for a great price not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for newlyweds
customer_reviews.text: After a year and a half we are still using them and we use them on a daily basis. Just make sure your wife knows not to use a fork or a knife to stir or cut things in them it destroys the teflon lining. (Spoken from experience) but they are perfect for newlyweds or a small family. If you got more than 2 kids you simply just cant fit that much spaghetti in these things. Jeffery Epstein didnt kill himself
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer Here! Great Price For The High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pan I've ever cooked with, it's hard to burn things! I'm great at burning a lot of different things, but that doesn't happen with these pots and pans. I'm very impressed with the ability to cook efficiently and look forward to buying more affordable + HIGH quality + cookware. Pros - Cooks quickly without burning food easily - Nonstick works as advertised - Difficult to burn anything - Great quality for the price Cons - I wish an additional lid was included in the package
customer_reviews.author: brian clark

customer_reviews.title: Wash easy, cook easy, completely worth it
customer_reviews.text: I use this cookware set everyday when I cook. It's especially good for an individual or couple living together because it includes small pots and pans that you can make single or small double servings of items in. The spatulas and strainers are great too, you can never have too many of those! I truely love this set, and it was SO cheap for the quality of these pots and pans. Nothing EVER sticks to them, and they wash so easily. I don't have a dishwasher, so that part is really really important.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: The utensils have held up wonderfully. The nonstick works great and they all wash ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this set as my primary cooking tools for over two months. The utensils have held up wonderfully. The nonstick works great and they all wash clean easily. The steam holes in the lids were a really nice surprise, although they are a little bit small so depending on how much steam I'm working with, sometimes I still have to set them down cockeyed to avoid bubbling. Cons - the handles on the pans and the small pot are loosening up over time. Hasn't been a problem at all while cooking but I notice it when I'm holding onto the handles. Overall 7/10 would recommend. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay ParkhurstTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: WOWW!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this as something quick because I'm a new mover and I was planning on getting new pots and what not because I didn't know what to expect or how long they would last. Let me tell ya! They are AMAZINGGGG!!!! SOOO easy to clean and 110% nonstick. I cook eggs on it or anything and nothing ever stays stuck on it. I dont even have to use butter! Absolutely in love. I have no regrets. And it's such an amazing price for really great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Destiné

customer_reviews.title: The set came in perfect condition and cooks very well
customer_reviews.text: The set came in perfect condition and cooks very well. It has a non-stick surface which is always good. The only thing I would say and is why personally I rated it 4 stars is because the pots are just slightly too small for my personal liking but my wife seems to love the set period. Other than that the pots are very useful and cook food well. Another thing is that in the first day of using the pots they will give off a certain burnt chemical smell even after I had washed them. Other then that I love the set and it's pretty good for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer Mata

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sturdy cooking set
customer_reviews.text: Ok I was so excited to get this set and doring my unboxing on of the pots is bent I can live with it but I'm a little disappointed the lid kind of fits on the bent one but other then that the pots and pans are great quality and sturdy just with the place were they are stored would keep the buyer in mind and to treat things as if they were there own
customer_reviews.author: madeline

customer_reviews.title: Pan misshaped
customer_reviews.text: The small sauce pan came warped so the lid does not fit. Is there anyway to get a replacement of this one piece without having to send the whole set back?
customer_reviews.author: julie d johansen

customer_reviews.title: Plastic/Chemical Taste - won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying this set. These are those pans you only use when all the other pans are dirty. I hate boiling water in the pots because it leaves a weird plastic/chemical taste in the water and in the food that’s being boiled. It serves its purpose I guess...
customer_reviews.author: Keila

customer_reviews.title: Great for a single apartment
customer_reviews.text: Great for a single apartment, quality for you buck. However, the pans are not nearly as non-stick as they look so make sure that you oil em up beforehand
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN RACHEL OR PAULA
customer_reviews.text: They are okay as pots and pans go. Don’t like the utensils. Wish they had atleast one more frying pan. (They could have left off those utensils for a pan) oh and only black one colorful. Ugh!!! How about a gray with white inside or Smokey blue...or a grey with Smokey blue polka dots. Black pants s always the go to...
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality starter set. Great sizes for a single or couple to cook out of. It's not the best pots and pans one can own, but it is for the price. Non stick and seems to be holding up nicely after 2.5 months of use. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Len901

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked these so much I bought 3 sets. My oldest son is in the Navy and when his family got to their new place, their items had not arrived yet. They needed cookware, so Amazon to the rescue and these got the job done. My second son just moved out with his friends and they needed cookware as well, I bought 2 sets for him and his roommates.
customer_reviews.author: 1 Sister 2 Sister

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I loved the item, alot of people leaving bad reviews for the size of it, but to me its perfect size not too big not too small, i notice a review saying the non stick teflon would come off? i used it, cleaned , scrubbed it and NONE of it came off, maybe that person got a deffective one... most definitely my best advice would be tomloolnon the good reveiws because i notice people will complain over anything or maybe packaging & handling broke their stuff im pretty sure they wouldn’t send a broken item.... with that being said, i aprove and this item is worth it, & for that price, you cannot top that off
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: A great pan set to have!
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of pans in this set. They seem pretty durable and are easy to clean. Even though they are non stick, I still use some sort of coating on them before cooking, so that they clean up even easier. I am happy with this purchase and time will tell how well they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Desire'

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: Being on a budget and looking for a cookware set that had everything I need seemed to be a challenge, until I came upon this set. It is very durable and cleans so easily. The nonstick is still there and there's never any residue after I wash and dry them. All in all I'd buy this set again or as a gift for someone. I just wish it came in colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth It!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new pots and pans set! I was skeptical because the price was lower than I expected! These are the exact sizes I need and the interchangeable lids are just perfect! I love the kitchen tools included. I am ready to start some serious cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Whale

customer_reviews.title: Great set, everything is included and works great and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set, everything is included and works great and feels like nice quality. I bought this because I wanted a set that doesn't have the usual non-stick carcinogens. I didn't do much research though so hopefully I got the right ones.
customer_reviews.author: William Powell

customer_reviews.title: Tiny pots
customer_reviews.text: These are TINY!! The bigget one is half the size of the raychel ray set and the smallest one is smaller than my hand! While these look slick and is oven safe to 450 degrees but I plan on meal prepping. This is like a toy set for little boys and girls to use when play tea party
customer_reviews.author: RatherHonest

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality we are still using it it’s been two years or more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cookware I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on a new cookware set before purchasing these. I am so glad i did. they are great. They are easy to wash and cook the food evenly. I feel the cookware cooks faster than the expensive ones i had before that i did not like.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal B.

customer_reviews.title: Pot set at great price
customer_reviews.text: The pots seem to be well made, durable. Light weight and can't go wrong with nonstick. The only problem I forsee is the knobs on the lids coming loose often. Time and use will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Love, love

customer_reviews.title: these work just fine for what you're going to use them for
customer_reviews.text: I'm 19 years old basically living on my own. I joined the United States Air Force July 2016. I've been at my first duty station now for a little over 7 months and I just got silverware, dished, pots, pans, etc. I have to say if you're just looking for pots and pans, not anything fancy, these work just fine for what you're going to use them for. It's a nice set that comes with pretty much all the basic cooking utensils you'll need. The only thing it doesn't have that would make it better, is a strainer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price. We're using it in a travel trailer.
customer_reviews.author: AZamazon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, so far...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking set that came with many utensils I was previously missing from my kitchen, which was a nice addition. The non-stick inside of the pan has worked very well (only used them twice now) and they have a nice appearance. One of the smaller saucepans was missing the silver paint on one spot along the rim, but nothing too noticeable. Also, some of the longer handles are a bit rough along the seams of the grip, will need to be sanded/cut down to make them smooth to the touch. Overall happy enough with the set, lets hope that feeling stays.
customer_reviews.author: Grad Reader

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Really loved it...however when I received it one of the lids came broken. It was minor...and I was able to fix it, so not a huge issue. However, products should be checked for damages before delivery or properly shipped so no damages occur during delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set ! This is my second verimi pot set. I had the colorful set first and that set was great! I gave the set away to a person who needed it. As soon as I moved I bought this set. I love how you can transfer the cookware from the stove to the oven! And the handle cools off very quickly afterwards as well!
customer_reviews.author: DaisyDee

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up very nice. No sticking while cooking
customer_reviews.text: Positive: Product was shipped flawlessly. Cleans up very nice. No sticking while cooking. Negative: the three smaller pots are very similar in size. They are way to small. I was under impression the pans would come with lids. (They don't.) Overall not my worst purchase; should of just paid more attention.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Greenidge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grill side burner or gas stove
customer_reviews.text: These were an extra set I purchased for outdoor cooking. I would NOT use these on my glass top range again. It marked up the top and I can’t remove those marks. They are great for grill cooking though.
customer_reviews.author: Jab

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - TOXIC SMELL
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this set! I bought this set when I recently moved to a new kitchen and the first use it already gave off these toxic fumes. I thought this was just because it was brand new, so I cooked with it for another month and the smell is still present. I don't know if these smells are harmful but they smell really bad and I threw them out and bought a new set. Please, please save your money and do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Tu

customer_reviews.title: Lids do not fit the pans!
customer_reviews.text: I'm still trying to figure out why in the world they would make the lids not fit all the pots AND pans. Putting the lids on your pans will definitely scratch them. I strongly suggest finding a better set. I would return these if I could get them back in the box but it arrived busted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set. Love them very much. So easy to clean and descent style. Only thing what would have been nice is to have one more pot a little larger than the two small pots that are part of the set. Something not as big as the dutch oven, but not as small as the largest of the small pots.
customer_reviews.author: Vyncent

customer_reviews.title: Great cooking set
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our RV and think this will be a great cooking tools and pans we'll use for the near future. We haven't used them yet, but they are perfect and we like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Joys read

customer_reviews.title: Very good pots and pans set
customer_reviews.text: These have been great, as an economical set. The non-stick is holding up well - I only hand wash, but it's really easy with the non-stick. I'm no chef, so I don't know how well they do with heat distribution and whatnot, but I'm happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Shippen

customer_reviews.title: Not used yet, will edit review in a month after usw
customer_reviews.text: Ok so i received this today. Nothing was broken. The lids fit everything. The set is perfect for me and my boyfriend. The pots arent HUGE, perfect for a small dinner for just me and him. I will edit my review when I actually USE the pots in a month to see if it still deserves a 5. This was more of an opening package review.
customer_reviews.author: Griceli Maldonado santiago

customer_reviews.title: For the price it’s not bad
customer_reviews.text: Love this set but the biggest pot (maybe even the bigger two) were bent where the cover does not close over the top of the pans
customer_reviews.author: Peter LaBonne

customer_reviews.title: NiceSet
customer_reviews.text: Received these pots as a Mother’s Day gift from my son & daughter. Very very nice. Looks nice, easy to clean and my meals actually cook better! Non stick!!
customer_reviews.author: Nae

customer_reviews.title: ... for the first time the other night for a pretty messy meal and with the utensils that this cookware ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time the other night for a pretty messy meal and with the utensils that this cookware is that came with , Not one scratch mark, not one burn mark from food sticking, and it just came clean with no f not one scratch mark, not one burn mark from food sticking, and it just came clean with no fuss no scrubbing no scraping nothing. This set is definitely worth it’s weight in gold. I definitely got more than my moneys worth with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Barnhill

customer_reviews.title: MISSING ITEMS!!
customer_reviews.text: Received the package today and the box was severely damaged. So much excess tape attempting to keep the box intact. The pots look okay, but I was missing several items, mostly the utensils. I wish they could’ve simply covered the missing equipment, instead I’m forced to return the entire package in the midsts of a pandemic, but with what box?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great Bang for my buck!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new pot set. I was looking for a range of different sizes and this set has a good variety. Very easy to clean. And love all the utensils that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Whit B

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These pots and pans work okay. Tops did not fit upon arrival and the material was easily bended to shape in order for the tops to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Shopper #12345

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: The fact that the larger skillet doesnt have a lid that properly fits it, really disappointed me. I got caught on surprise by this during a storm, so I had to use a plate to cover my food.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a bachelor!
customer_reviews.text: I used it to make burritos. I made the rice in the small dutch oven, beans in the middle pot and both frying pans.. This is normally a mess to clean up, but the cookware cleaned up very nicely. The rice in the small dutch oven came out nicer than in my rice cooker and a lot easier to clean up. I've only had it for 2 weeks, but so far I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: K W

customer_reviews.title: I like them. But I wish it had come with ...
customer_reviews.text: I like them. But I wish it had come with a lid for the big skillet. I don't understand why people think skillet lids are unnecessary. Just give me a skillet lid to keep my chicken hot. Dang.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Small sized set!!
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than I thought! I guess I should have found out cm to inches... As I'm disappointed this set is so small. So, I was excited about the deal/price, but now I should have shopped longer and found the right gift. Now have to figure how much it will cost to salvage the gift and also buy a bigger pot too. This is a STARTER SET only.
customer_reviews.author: LORI B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Cookware
customer_reviews.text: Had these pans for 11months and they are like brand new. They cook amazingly, clean up easily, and will last if you follow the break in instructions. Also of note, they have never seen a dishwasher so that may have varying results. These absolutely crushed any set I have bought at Wal-Mart no matter the price. Only issue is that the glass covers don't work with the frying pans well because of being a different size.
customer_reviews.author: MiniGunz

customer_reviews.title: Great saucepan set
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my son who is on the Air Force and living in the dorms and he wanted to start cooking his own meals. So, this set is just right for him. He likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great set of pot and pans. They are reasonably sized and work great! I purchased these after browsing through the reviews and understanding that the handles aren't protected, and require oven mitts to use. For the price, it was absolutely worth it, and I've enjoyed making a variety of breakfast items and a couple of entrees since.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: No lids for pans
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new set because I needed a fry pan with a lid. Lids are not interchangeable with pans and pots. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Hillargh

customer_reviews.title: Exploded while cooking!
customer_reviews.text: Held up good for awhile, until one of the lids exploded while cooking. Scary experience!
customer_reviews.author: whatpaigeesaid

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for newbies!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, thid is a great buy for someone moving into their first home. Weve had no problems and have been using these for 6 months now. Normal wear and tear use will show over time!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Khounsvat

customer_reviews.title: Don't last that long
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the pots and pans I was so excited they seemed very sturdy, good material and overall really nice. I purchased these in March and they started chipping around December, the inside of the pan os falling apart, some of the other cheaper pans I have lasted over a year without any issues. Very dissapointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Berenice Thorin

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Pans were a bit smaller than expected but great christmas gift for mother in law.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Abner

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price I would give this set of pots 5 stars. If you realize you paid less then $50 you will be presently surprised by the quality of the products. The utensils are a little flimsy but useable. I bought this set for a vacation home and would recommend them to my friends. Since I have only used them for a week or so can't say how long they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Jayjackson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price !
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a new pot and pan set after using the Rachel Ray set . That didn’t even last a year! We have high hopes for this one . So far so good !
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality for the price. I gifted these to my mom about two months ago and no chips or fried bottoms so far! Great non-stick when you use a cooking spray. I would recommend for anyone, especially someone that is about to live in their first apartment/house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice deal
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pots and pans. Only complaint is injnowbtgevscres to the handles on the lids will come off. I have had similar styles in the past but for the money, they work
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all!
customer_reviews.text: The pots and pans work perfectly for me! The spatula started to melt with just one use. I had to buy a separate wooden spatula so that I can use a spatula without it melting and without scratching the pans. Definitely would recommend for anyone who needs a new set of pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Large pan broke after just five months
customer_reviews.text: Decent set, but you get what you pay for. The handle completely broke off the large frying pan after only five months. The others are fine but were not used as often.
customer_reviews.author: rawk

customer_reviews.title: Decent Set
customer_reviews.text: A few pots arrived with scratches on the outside. The largest pot's lid doesn't sit perfectly on the pot but I can still use it. Beyond this, the cookware set is functional and easy to clean. I just wish the skillets had lids. It would make a huge difference in use. Great for a college student or someone in need of basic cookware until they can afford a higher quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for the friend & she really enjoys them.
customer_reviews.author: Cara F.

customer_reviews.title: Considering getting another one!!! So good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this set as a present for my mom to have at her home. She LOVED it!! All of the items are really pretty and had a really nice finish on them. The pots and pans are still looking great after being used a bunch of times since I gave it to her for Christmas. I am really considering buying one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, seemingly unsafe product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, seemingly unsafe product. I just bought these and used them to boil water, and they filled my house with an extremely strong plastic chemical smell. I had to open the windows to air out the house and am worried toxins leached into the food.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cookware set
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cookware set ... so far no issues. They do appear they will not stand the test of time. They are also very lightweight compared to some more expensive T-Fal products purchased. This would be perfect for anyone in a new home, just starting out or seeking a good inexpensive cookware set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are good quality. The only thing is there isn't one ...
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality. The only thing is there isn't one big pot to fit a lot of veggies in. We often have to use two to fit everything. Overall good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Melford

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this set for just over two months and it’s holdikg up great so far. definitely a good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D. Dameron

customer_reviews.title: Not bad as a start up kit when on a budget
customer_reviews.text: These pots & pans are good for the price and the utensil's they come with are a plus. This is a good buy for those moving into their own place who might be on a budget. *** January 2020 Update *** these lasted me a little over 2 years but I definitely knew within 1 year of having then that I needed better ones.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: I particularly like the mid-sized Dutch oven
customer_reviews.text: I cook at least two meals from scratch every day and had finally just worn out my old set of pots and pans. This set was just what I wanted. I particularly like the mid-sized Dutch oven. It is the perfect size for so many things. And having a new soup ladle that is wide, just wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Babs Z.

customer_reviews.title: They are holding up brilliantly. No scratches and they heat up evenly
customer_reviews.text: I have had the pans for a little over a month. They are holding up brilliantly. No scratches and they heat up evenly.
customer_reviews.author: GoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The title pretty much says it all. They are cheap pots and pans, but I don’t have any complaints for the price. A great set for someone that doesn’t want to fork over large amounts for better ones, or for a college student.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Hertz

customer_reviews.title: They scratch really easy but they aren't bad for a really cheap starter ...
customer_reviews.text: There's stickers on the bottom of two of these, please be smarter than me and make sure you see them and remove them. I didn't see them even after I put them in the dishwasher to clean and they burned. No major damage or anything, but it could be problematic for others, I don't know. They scratch really easy but they aren't bad for a really cheap starter set.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing kitchen set and they do the trick. A little on the small side but they work. Perfect for a first time apartment owner
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Borishkevich

customer_reviews.title: Made my wife a happy woman.
customer_reviews.text: My wife opened this set as a gift on Christmas Day. She used the entire set to cook Christmas Dinner. Everything cooked evenly and no sticking! It's the perfect weight and very sturdy! She literally packed up all her old cookware and gave it to our kids! No complaints, excellent price and excellent product. WI feel is very hapay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are really good quality. Mine came without damages. The cooking / serving utensils were okay. Personally, I’m going to buy other ones separately but if you just need a few utensils to get the job done, then these are fine.
customer_reviews.author: DO

customer_reviews.title: Scratched my stove up, not good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are nice at first. I got them a few weeks ago. They scratch my glass stovetop. They are very rough at the bottom. The inside has been good with being nonstick but the inside is scratching already.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I bought this set for my daughter for college & ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my daughter for college & she absolutely loves it! Thank you! (I'll be hoping to buy another set for my other daughter in a couple of years time when she starts college too). These pans are built to last & I'm sure they will be used for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Really well made. Beautiful set!! I might buy a set for a family member too.. Really worth the price.. I was worried about the quality .. Buying online.. But they really are very nice.. And you get a lot more items then i thought lol.
customer_reviews.author: mariah johnson

customer_reviews.title: Super buy
customer_reviews.text: Great set of pans. Food doesn’t stick and they clean up well. I purchased the black set and am very happy. They are a little smaller than I thought they would be, but I have a small family and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amw

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I know they're not high quality, just thought they'd last longer. Cheap, easily scratched and handles become loose. They got me through until I bought a better quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Good cookware set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my new apt. The set came well packaged and everything was in order. I decided to wait for a month before writing this email to see how well the set would be. The cookware set works well for 1-4 person, the non-sticks withstand great from daily use, same goes to the utensils. I took one star off due to the scratches on the outside at the bottom of the pots and pans. They seem to get scratches really easily, maybe the paint were too thin!? idk. Overall this is great starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Moon2jz

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: Product came very well packaged, nothing was damaged. Very useful set and is dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I am disappointed that they are not dishwasher safe. But it doesn't hide this fact.
customer_reviews.author: Stewie

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had them for two months and only cook a few times a week because it’s just me and they are already burnt on the bottom. And the handles look raggedy. But they are definitely non- stick.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Norry

customer_reviews.title: the pots and pans are no stick and very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Pots and pans are decent. Two of the lids came broke and the plastic items are dollar store material/quality. I emailed back just hoping for a replacement on the 2 broken lids and got no response. That being said.... the pots and pans are no stick and very easy to clean. Rest is junk. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: After a year still great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had for a year now and it is a wonderful set. Nothing has broken.
customer_reviews.author: pamela brown

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent starter set. It's not the highest quality but also not the lowest.
customer_reviews.author: Jasen

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great value for your money, totally worth it. Have cooked with them multiple times to make sure before I reviewed and I’ve had zero problems. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elysia Gartner

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for an excellent set of cookware.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of pots and pans, and a good stater kit of utensils. Recommend to anyone. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeM

customer_reviews.title: good price, good product.
customer_reviews.text: The non stick coating works great. Pans have nice heft to them. I got this for my son's apartment, and did not want to spend a lot of money. We were pleasantly surprised by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cabo Jim

customer_reviews.title: Extremely light weight and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I feel like there is a lot of pieces. The packaging was cute and protected the products well. I have cooked with them a couple times. The cook ware is plain Jane black. Extremely easy to clean and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli R.

customer_reviews.title: Starter
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set for a young adult moving into their first place.
customer_reviews.author: TAS

customer_reviews.title: The price is great and overall the pots are pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The price is great and overall the pots are pretty sturdy. However, the handle on my large pan is starting to feel loose and I've only been using it for 2 almost 3 months. The spoon is flimsy and it bends when I use it. The lid for the large pot also does not fit the cooking pan. Fix these things in your next big production of this set.
customer_reviews.author: Vianey

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: Love them just wish it had 2 more bigger pots cook for a big family sometimes
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: They're not as durable as I would like, but it works perfect for me and it was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Manura

customer_reviews.title: Pot sets
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok could be a little bigger and need more covers
customer_reviews.author: Stacy-Ann Cole

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, must have, you will enjoy your meals without burning or getting stuck to pot. I would not want to forget the quality, very great quality, have been using them for over a month and they still look new!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know what to expect but it came packaged very nicely was super clean. All of the pieces included came just as expected and the whole things works! It’s definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality set
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality set. Wish it came with a 12” omelet pan. Also wish it had a lid to fit the large fry pan it does come with. The pots it comes with are a little small, but about expected for under $50. They have survived the dish washer a couple times just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Ares

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick at all.
customer_reviews.text: This pors are worth it for the price. I recommend it... buying 2 more for family members
customer_reviews.author: Paula

product_meta.title: Vremi 15 Piece Nonstick Cookware Set - Durable Aluminum Pots and Pans with Cooking Utensils - Oven Safe Multi Quart Enameled Saucepans Dutch Ovens and Fry Pans with Glass Lid - Black
product_meta.description: The Vremi 15 Piece Saucy Pots Nonstick Cookware Set is the ultimate starter set for stocking your kitchen with all of the essentials. Includes 4 nonstick pots with 4 matching glass lids, 2 non-stick frying pans, and 5 non stick cooking utensils, for a total of 15 pieces. With this cookware and accessories set, you can whip up delicious, perfectly cooked dishes like a pro, without making a hefty investment — an amazing deal for everyday chefs, college dorm, RV kitchens, first apartments, camping cookware, and more! Product Details & Care Mini 1 Quart Pot with Lid and Long Handle: 12” L x 2.5” H x 5.5” Dia. Mini Saute Pan and Long Handle: 14.5” L x 1.5” H x 7.75” Dia. Small 1.3 Quart Pot with Lid and Long Handle: 13” L x 2.6” H x 6.25” Dia. Medium 1.75 Quart Pot with Lid and Short Handles: 12.5” L x 3” H x 7” Dia. Large 4.2 Quart Pot with Lid and Short Handles: 15” L x 4.25” H x 9.5” Dia. Large Frying Pan with Long Handle: 17.75” L x 1.8” H x 10.25” Dia. Pots and Pans Materials: Aluminum body with Enamel black or color exterior and Nonstick interior, TPR handles and Glass lid covers 5 Nonstick Cooking Utensils: Slotted Spoon, Slotted Spatula, Spaghetti Server, Soup Ladle and Potato Masher Cooking Utensils Material: Heat resistant Nylon All parts made with premium durable, non toxic, BPA Free food-grade materials All parts Hand Wash Only All Pots and Pans Oven Safe up to 480°F (NOTE: Glass lids and Utensils are NOT oven safe) For full care instructions and safety warnings, always refer to Vremi product box and manual
feature_bullets: ALL IN ONE NONSTICK COOKWARE - 15 pcs pots and pans set includes 4 pots with 4 glass lids and 2 sauce / frying pans. Made from durable, non toxic food grade aluminum with enameled exterior and nonstick interior for an evenly heated simmer, sear or fry

VENTED GLASS LID COVERS for POTS - Each nesting, heavy duty, stock or soup pot comes with a removable vented glass lid with stainless steel rims and easy-to-grasp knobs, for direct viewing of foods without letting the steam or mess splatter escape

COOKING UTENSILS and HANGER HANDLES - Comes with 5 non-stick cooking utensil accessories in heat resistant, BPA free black nylon that won't warp or scratch. Each has an ergonomic handle and hanging storage hole for convenient organization and display

SETS for HOME DORM RV or CAMPING - Lightweight with many sizes, from big pots for family meals to mini travel sized cookware for outdoor backpacking. Compatible with gas and electric stovetop ranges. NOT for use on induction cooktops. Hand wash only

OVEN SAFE with MULTI QUART SIZE - Small, medium and large enamel over aluminum pots, skillet pan, and saucepan set has a capacity range from 1 to 4.2 qt and is oven safe up to 300°F (glass lids are NOT oven safe), making it a great bang for your buck
